definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: It’s also noteworthy that the African Union failed to endorse the anti-Gadaffi operation.
sentences.chinese: 还值得注意的是非洲联盟未能支持反卡扎菲作战。

sentences.english: There were no African forces, neither were Somali security forces there.
sentences.chinese: 没有非洲联盟力量，也没有索马里安全力量在场。

sentences.english: His spokesman called for talks mediated by the African Union.
sentences.chinese: 他的发言人要求在非洲联盟的调解下进行会谈。

definition: African Union (AU), abbr. for 非洲聯盟|非洲联盟
